name: Fireworks & Chill VR - Demo
description:
Welcome to Fireworks & Chill where you will explore a universe filled with fireworks, barrels, torches, and campfires that you light up for rewards. 

In this demo version, you will learn how to navigate the open world, light up fireworks, and then transport yourself to a Desert filled with surprises. 

Each time the level is loaded the objectives randomly hide making each play through a fun new challenge.

Call it Hide & Seek but with stuff you can light on fire!

If you like the demo, here's a link to the full game with 5 more beautiful worlds for you to explore.
